segments.text: May I speak to Mr.Huang , please ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'm sorry . Mr.Huang is quite busy right now . Could I pass him the message ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , you see , I won't be able to keep my 9
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Let me see . He's free from 3:00 to 4:30 tomorrow afternoon . Can you make it then ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , of course . Thank you very much .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You're quite welcome . Thank you for calling . Bye-byeB
segments.speaker: S2
